posts.content:
A message for 16861008 from Kyle Zang sent at 2025-03-25 16:03:23
             Message: Hello, I actually was a field Technician for NPC international who owned these stores from 2017 until 2022 and I worked in ALL of these stores in the past as their IT TECH they went bankrupt and sold to Flynn Restaurant Group, but I chose a different pathway with a different franchise!.

So not only do I know Wendys Infrastructure in and out, but I specifically know these sites and locations 
I would be able to take all of them for you, so you only have 1 tech involved 
I am only asking for a small higher rate because of FN fees and travel since some of them are about an hour each way 

also, there is 2 in Chambersburg and 1 in Waynesboro that maybe could all be done the same day if possible?
let me know I have requested them all and sent this same message in all WO's
